prompt: So, ages ago some fucker broke into my house and stole all of my
continuation:
So, ages ago some fucker broke into my house and stole all of my possessions.

I got home late at night and noticed that my door was wide open, and all of my shit was missing. I immediately called the cops and filed a report, but I knew it was pointless. The only thing I could do was hope that whoever took my stuff would return it or at least some of it.

A few days later, I received a call from the police saying that they found my stolen possessions in a dumpster behind a 7-Eleven. Apparently, the thief was high on drugs and didn't even know what he was taking. The cops arrested him and brought him to jail, but I never got my stuff back.

It was a real bummer, but at least I got my bike back. It was the only thing that was really valuable to me, and I was relieved that it was safe. In the end, I learned my lesson and made sure to lock my door every time I left the house.
